description:
A versatile mind mapping tool for collaborative brainstorming.

EdrawMind is designed for creating fresh new visual innovations, integrating your bullet points to structure an overall mind map. It is convenient and helpful for you to use EdrawMind to sort out your thoughts or ideas in order to find solutions to problems.
Product Feature Experience Optimization
1. Custom theme feature enhancement: Added support for setting horizontal and vertical spacing of themes, enhancing the flexibility of personalized visual configurations.
2. Icon tab optimization: Supports recording recently used icons to improve icon selection efficiency.
Defect Issue Fix
1. Resolve the issue where search tags can't search for all content, ensuring the completeness of search results.
2. Fix the issue where the text style does not display after inserting an outer frame into certain theme layouts.
3. Fix the issue where entering Russian automatically turns uppercase in certain scenarios.
